recipesJson.name: The Real Mcds Shamrock Shake
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: Ive been trying too make a good shamrock shake and it has taken me along time but now since I have RF shamrock shake it makes it a lot easier and I used it so far bcuz I don't know how strong the flavor and if its too strong I will more likely turn it down to maybe .5-1% and go from there and see how it tastes
